name: Petite Pink Princess Flower Headband with Swarovski Crystal
description:
What an adorable little flower. It is so cute and dainty just like your little princess.

This Single Petite Pink Flower comes on a extremely stretchy white elastic headband.

Single flower headband [Ready to ship] - headband for an Average Newborn up to a 2/3 year old and possibly even longer.

**Also available in Hot Pink [not pictured]

If you need another size please just let me know.

THIS IS OUR STANDARD SIZE CHART
BASED ON APPROX AVERAGE HEADSIZES:

XX-Small -- Preemie/Newborn (Newborn photo props) approx 0-3 months - 11 inches

X-Small -- Average sized Newborn to 4 months - 13 inches

Small -- 4 months to 12 months - 15 inches

Medium -- 12 months to 3 years - 17 inches

Large -- 3 years to 6/7 years - 18 inches

X-Large -- 6/7 years to Adult - 19 inches

♥These items are carefully handmade to order. The flower you receive may slightly vary from the one shown in the picture, but it will be just as unique.

♥ If you have any questions, please feel free to send me a message.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This item does contain small parts. Please don't leave small children unsupervised with this item.

**Although we take Paypal, you do not need a Paypal account to purchase. Paypal can process your credit card without a Paypal account. Just follow directions during checkout.

Thank you to Michele Reyes with Michele Reyes Photography, of Cedar Hills, Utah, who took these beautiful pictures. Check out her Photography and Blog sites at:
http://michelereyes.com/

name: Baby Toddler Child Couture Flower Bib Statement Necklace with Green Star Flower instead of Brown/Cre
description:
You can't help but LOVE this Flower Bib Necklace. It makes your photos that much more special and sweet. It will also go great with any outfit for your little angel.

This Satin Necklace features embellishments of rhinestones, pearls, crystal, lace and feathers.

**PLEASE NOTE**
*I only have this bib necklace available with a green and white satin star flower [instead of the brown and off-white satin star]. You can see a picture of the green and white star here:
http://www.etsy.com/listing/56428423/satin-2-inch-kanzashi-flower-with

♥ If you have any questions, please feel free to send me a message.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This item does contain small parts. Please don't leave small children unsupervised with this item.

Thank you to Michele Reyes with Michele Reyes Photography of Cedar Hills, Utah who took this beautiful picture. Check out her Photography and Blog sites at:
http://michelereyes.com/
She does amazing work at a great price! I'd book an appointment NOW for the Holidays.

name: Alaina La Fleur Satin Fabric Trio Birdcage Veil, Pleated Satin Trim Headband Embellished with Flower
description:
This Alaina La Fleur Headband is one timeless vintage inspired piece. It will add that unique and elegant touch you are wanting for that special day.

This lace headband will fit an Average 10 month old up to a 3 year old. Lace elastic is extra stretchy.

name: Satin 2 inch Kanzashi Flower with matching Rhinestone - Pink, Purple, Green and Cream with Brown (Co
description:
These unique, handmade, hand sewn Satin Kanzashi Flowers are so dainty and beautiful. You'll want one of each color!

The flower measures about 2 inches in diameter and comes on a 1/4" white elastic headband. You can choose from 4 different colors or buy one of each.

Colors: Pink, Purple, Green and Cream with Brown.
see picture of other flower here:
http://www.etsy.com/listing/56428423/satin-2-inch-kanzashi-flower-with

Tell me which color flower you'd like and what size headband when placing your order.
If you'd like more than one color:
2. Make sure you change the quantity of items you want to buy from 1 to how many you would like and also tell me, when you check out, which colors you would like and what size headband for each color. [Leave your note on your etsy checkout page – not in the PayPal page].

Sizes to choose from:
XX-Small -- Preemie/Newborn approx 0-3 months - [11 inches]

X-Small -- Average sized Newborn to 4 months - [13 inches]

Small -- 4 months to 12 months - [15 inches]

Medium -- 12 months to 3 years - [17 inches]

Large -- 3 years to 6/7 years - [18 inches]

X-Large -- 6/7 years to Adult - [19 inches]

♥These items are carefully handmade to order. The flower you receive may slightly vary from the one shown in the picture, but it will be just as unique.
♥ If you have any questions, please feel free to convo me.
